name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Value Engineer with over 10 years of experience in leveraging analytical skills and management consulting to optimize business processes and drive customer success. Proficient in project management, value-based selling, and crafting boardroom presentations that resonate with executive stakeholders. Proven track record of deploying innovative backend solutions with a strong technical background in **Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask)** and cloud technologies such as **AWS** and **Azure**. Highly skilled in change management and maintaining a consulting mindset, ensuring impactful outcomes for clients in top-tier organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
